14.content:
"I know what you really want." said Santa, with a smile.
Jack just looked at him. He had never told anyone about that. How could anyone know? Santa laughed.
"You forget who you're talking to, Jack. I know who's naughty or nice, remember? I also know the reasons."
"But..."
'Oh don't worry, Jack, wanting others to gain weight is more common than you think. Usually it's harmless. I know you've held back since you were a child. Tonight, though, I'm going to let you have your dream."
Jack stood there, wide eyed.
" Just for tonight, I'm going to fatten a person of your choice up to my weight, 300 lbs." Santa continued. He placed his hand on Jack's shoulder. "It will be for tonight only, understand that, and there will be no harm to them."
Jack couldn't believe it,
"The question is now Jack... " Santa said with a twinkle in his eye. "Who will it be?"
14.title: Other

142.content:
There was only one person Jack could think of at the moment. The one person who had been a world class pain in the butt. His 13 year old brother, Derek.
He always had to have everything he wanted, and would whine and cry until he got it. His parents usually caved into his demands just to keep him quiet. He never appreciated what he got from anyone.
"Derek."
Santa smiled. "A good choice. He's been on the naughty list for years. It will be interesting to see his reaction to this."
"What do I have to do?" asked Jack.
"I'll put you in his room, then, all you have to do is think about how much weight you want him to gain, and it'll happen."
This is going to be sooo good! thought Jack.
Next thing he knew he was in Derek's room. It had always been off limits to Jack, so he had really never seen it, except through the open door. He had a TV, game console, and it seemed like a hundred games. Also a laptop, and so much more stuff.
And there in bed, was Derek....
142.title: His bratty little brother, Derek.

Jack smiled.
" Why, Derek, I just want to give you an early Christmas present, that's all."
Derek's face lit up. "You do?"
"Sure, after all you really deserve this one."

"You'll have to come to get it."
Derek threw the covers off and got out of bed. Jack could see that he was already on the pudgy side. It was from doing nothing but eating and playing his video games. He really didn't have friends, as no one liked him.

info.description:
You are an 18 year old boy named Jack. It's Christmas eve and you can't sleep, so you go downstairs. You find Santa putting presents under the tree. You realize it's going to be a long night as Santa makes your Christmas wish come true.

Rules:

1.This story will have some gay elements to it, so if you don't like that stuff, there are other stories on this site for you.
2. Language and sex are allowed
3. You and/or Santa can transform in these ways: Growth, weight gain, muscle gain, hair growth, shrinking. You can transform in other ways, but these are the main ways.
4. 450 GP's are being given for every good (meaning no two-sentence chapters) non-choice chapters.
5. You can introduce new characters, but no girls.

Have fun!
